alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chester; Western Chester (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New Castle and southwestern Chester Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Farmington, or 9 miles northeast of Havre De Grace, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Kennett Square, Oxford, West Grove, Glen Roy, Stanton, North Star, Glasgow, Bear, Landenberg, Mount Vernon, Pike Creek, Kemblesville, Hockessin, Ashland, Homeville, Avondale, Toughkenamon and Brookside. This includes Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 1 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern Delaware...and southeastern Pennsylvania.
